argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | staffval.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | staffval.i | |- .* = ( *r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | staffval.f | |- .xb = ( *rf ` R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = A -> ( .* ` x ) = ( .* ` A ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_staffval | |- .xb = ( x e. B |-> ( .* ` x ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( .* ` A ) e. _V |
| 7 | 4, 5, 6 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( A e. B -> ( .xb ` A ) = ( .* ` A ) ) |
